医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
植物性饮食的隐藏威胁：对鲜为人知的豆类过敏日益增加研究人员发现了豌豆、扁豆和羽扇豆等新兴豆类过敏原，呼吁进行更广泛的研究和更好的诊断来控制日益增加的过敏反应。植物性饮食的流行带来了新的过敏挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Hidden-threats-in-plant-based-diets-Rising-allergies-to-lesser-known-legumes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Hidden-threats-in-plant-based-diets-Rising-allergies-to-lesser-known-legumes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fa2492a-4307-494e-a37f-cdfa16e89700 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 00:11:00 -0400 Hidden threats in plant-based diets: Rising allergies to lesser-known legumes
首席全科医生敦促对遭受倦怠的医生和医护人员采取富有同情心的态度一位顶级全科医生表示，应该对遭受倦怠的医生、护士和其他医护人员表示同情，而不是因为身体不适而受到指责。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Leading-GP-urges-compassionate-approach-towards-doctors-healthcare-staff-suffering-burnout.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Leading-GP-urges-compassionate-approach-towards-doctors-healthcare-staff-suffering-burnout.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f32bf905-d94a-4447-896b-b7301201b622 Sun, 14 Jul 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Leading GP urges compassionate approach towards doctors, healthcare staff suffering burnout
综述强调了铁死亡的独特特征和机制中国浙江大学医学院的 Junxia Min、Fudi Wang 等人对称为铁死亡的程序性细胞死亡进行了深入的综述，这种死亡是由铁依赖性脂质过氧化驱动的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Review-highlights-unique-characteristics-and-mechanisms-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Review-highlights-unique-characteristics-and-mechanisms-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26de677b-ef2e-401b-8843-22374ea52d90 Sun, 14 Jul 2024 23:42:28 -0400 Review highlights unique characteristics and mechanisms of ferroptosis
美国 40% 的癌症病例与生活方式的选择有关2019 年，近 40% 的癌症病例和 44% 的癌症死亡是由可改变的危险因素造成的，其中吸烟是主要原因。这项研究强调了通过改变生活方式显着减轻癌症负担的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/4025-of-US-cancer-cases-linked-to-lifestyle-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/4025-of-US-cancer-cases-linked-to-lifestyle-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08b98a02-79b2-44c6-a0a4-5df945370a56 Sun, 14 Jul 2024 23:40:00 -0400 40% of US cancer cases linked to lifestyle choices
民意调查：大多数英国人对癌症诊断的恐惧超过任何其他疾病根据今天发布的民意调查，三分之二的公众表示，他们非常或有些担心被告知自己患有这种疾病，这一比例高于任何其他疾病，包括痴呆症和心脏病发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Poll-Majority-of-Brits-fear-cancer-diagnosis-more-than-any-other-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Poll-Majority-of-Brits-fear-cancer-diagnosis-more-than-any-other-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3a1862f-8a9a-4700-bb58-8cbae3c5bb5f Sun, 14 Jul 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Poll: Majority of Brits fear cancer diagnosis more than any other condition
研究发现食用干果可降低 2 型糖尿病风险最近的研究表明，较高的干果摄入量与降低 2 型糖尿病的风险有关，这凸显了尽管干果含糖量高，但其潜在的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Study-finds-dried-fruit-conspiration-lowers-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Study-finds-dried-fruit-conspiration-lowers-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5dccad9-703b-4e48-93b4-78467a7e2196 Sun, 14 Jul 2024 23:23:00 -0400 Study finds dried fruit consumption lowers type 2 diabetes risk
研究发现终生性高潮差距受年龄、性别和性取向的影响研究揭示了不同年龄、性别和性取向之间性高潮率持续存在的差异，凸显了包容性性健康教育和干预措施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Study-finds-lifelong-orgasm-gap-influenced-by-age-gender-and- Sex-orientation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Study-finds-lifelong-orgasm-gap-influenced-by-age-gender-and- Sex-orientation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6576eaae-5202-4d28-93cd-793cbe717586 Sun, 14 Jul 2024 22:50:00 -0400 Study finds lifelong orgasm gap influenced by age, gender, and sexual orientation
Reddit 的人工智能分析揭示了公众对 GLP-1 药物减肥和心理健康益处的兴趣研究人员使用 AI 分析了超过 391,000 个 Reddit 讨论，以研究公众对 GLP-1 RA 的看法，发现人们对减肥、副作用和获取问题高度感兴趣，大多数情绪是中性到积极的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/AI-analysis-of-Reddit-reveals-public-interest-in-GLP-1-drugs-for-weight-loss-and-mental-health-福利.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/AI-analysis-of-Reddit-reveals-public-interest-in-GLP-1-drugs-for-weight-loss-and-mental-health-福利.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff8c9cf6-15e1-48cf-a794-9e28304cb1ce Sun, 14 Jul 2024 22:12:00 -0400 AI analysis of Reddit reveals public interest in GLP-1 drugs for weight loss and mental health benefits
益生菌真的对健康人有益吗？ 《营养进展》的最新研究回顾了益生菌对健康个体的益处，强调了证据差距以及需要进一步研究以支持预防建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Do-probiotics-really-benefit-healthy-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/Do-probiotics-really-benefit-healthy-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa3df192-1950-43ed-b2e1-649a042237f8 Sun, 14 Jul 2024 21:36:00 -0400 Do probiotics really benefit healthy people?
基于 GLP1 的肥胖药物的新大脑靶点可能会减轻体重而不引起恶心研究人员发现了驱动饱腹感和厌恶感的独特后脑 GLP1R 神经元，为有效、无副作用的肥胖治疗提供了新的靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/New-brain-targets-for-GLP1-based-obesity-drugs-may-reduce-weight-without-nausea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240714/New-brain-targets-for-GLP1-based-obesity-drugs-may-reduce-weight-without-nausea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e47194a7-1f17-422d-a6fc-004689c396db Sun, 14 Jul 2024 21:11:00 -0400 New brain targets for GLP1-based obesity drugs may reduce weight without nausea
